author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: China: Racism Against Africans ‘Isolated Incidents’ and ‘Misunderstandings’
description: The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and its media organs lashed out Monday against African leaders for complaining about rampant racial discrimination against Africans living in Chinese cities, dismissing their complaints as a few “isolated incidents” and “misu…
